languages.text: {n}Стоя напротив операционного алтаря Ярма, вы взираете на него — возможно, самый могущественный инструмент уничтожения в истории вашей расы. Ключ, открывающий врата к практически ничем не ограниченным власти и величию. Орудие... Когитаторный блок, транслирующий приказы заточенному К'тан, разлетается на куски. Уже не орудие. Лишь вечная темница.{/n}

{n}As you stand before the Yoke's control altar, you gaze upon it, possibly the greatest instrument of destruction in the history of your race. The key that unlocks the gates to the nigh-unfettered heights of power. A weapon... The cogitator block that was designed to transmit orders to the imprisoned C'tan shatters into pieces. It is a weapon no longer — merely a prison.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Стоя напротив операционного алтаря Ярма, вы взираете на него — возможно, самый могущественный инструмент уничтожения в истории вашей расы. Ключ, открывающий врата к практически ничем не ограниченным власти и величию. Орудие... Когитаторный блок, транслирующий приказы заточенному К'тан, разлетается на куски. Уже не орудие. Лишь вечная темница.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Standing on the opposite side of the Yoke's operational altar, you look at it — possibly the most powerful weapon of destruction in the history of your race. The key that opens up the gates to the almost-limitless power and grandeur. A weapon... The cogitator block, transferring the orders to the imprisoned C'Tan, shatters into pieces. Not a weapon anymore — just a prison.{/n}

{n}Standing on the opposite side of the Yoke's operational altar, you look at it — possibly the most powerful weapon of destruction in the history of your race. The key that opens up the gates to the almost-limitless power and grandeur. A weapon... The cogitator block, transferring the orders to the imprisoned C'Tan, shatters into pieces. Not a weapon anymore — just a prison.{/n}

{n}Standing on the opposite side of the Yoke's operational altar, you look at it: arguably the most powerful weapon of destruction in the history of your race. The key that unlocks the gates to the almost-limitless power and grandeur. A weapon... The cogitator block, transferring the orders to the imprisoned the C'Tan, shatters into pieces. Not a weapon anymore—just a prison.{/n}

The key that unlocks the gates to the almost-limitless power and grandeur. A weapon... The cogitator block, transferring the orders to the imprisoned the C'Tan, shatters into pieces. Not a weapon anymore—just a prison.{/n}

{n}As you stand before the Yoke's control altar, you gaze upon it, possibly the greatest instrument of destruction in the history of your race. The key that unlocks the gates to the nigh-unfettered heights of power. A weapon... The cogitator block that was designed to transmit orders to the imprisoned C'tan shatters into pieces. It is a weapon no longer — merely a prison.{/n}

{n}As you stand before the Yoke's control altar, you gaze upon it, possibly the greatest instrument of destruction in the history of your race. The key that unlocks the gates to the nigh-unfettered heights of power. A weapon... The cogitator block that was designed to transmit orders to the imprisoned C'tan shatters into pieces. It is a weapon no longer — merely a prison.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Devant l'autel de contrôle du Joug, vous observez ce qui est sans doute l'instrument de destruction le plus puissant de l'histoire de votre race. La clé qui ouvre les portes d'un pouvoir presque illimité. Une arme... Le bloc de cogitation, conçu pour transmettre des ordres au C'tan emprisonné, vole en éclats. L'arme n'est plus qu'une simple prison.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you stand before the Yoke's control altar, you gaze upon it, possibly the greatest instrument of destruction in the history of your race. The key that unlocks the gates to the nigh-unfettered heights of power. A weapon... The cogitator block that was designed to transmit orders to the imprisoned C'tan shatters into pieces. It is a weapon no longer — merely a prison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Devant l'autel de contrôle du Joug, vous observez ce qui est sans doute l'instrument de destruction le plus puissant de l'histoire de votre race. La clé qui ouvre les portes d'un pouvoir presque illimité. Une arme... Le bloc de cogitation, conçu pour transmettre des ordres au C'tan emprisonné, vole en éclats. L'arme n'est plus qu'une simple prison.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Puedes verla en el lado opuesto del altar operativo del Yugo: probablemente, el arma de destrucción masiva más poderosa de la historia de tu especie. La llave que abre las puertas de un poder y una grandeza casi ilimitados. Un arma... El bloque cogitador diseñado para enviar órdenes al C'tan aprisionado estalla en mil pedazos. Ya no es un arma, tan solo una prisión.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you stand before the Yoke's control altar, you gaze upon it, possibly the greatest instrument of destruction in the history of your race. The key that unlocks the gates to the nigh-unfettered heights of power. A weapon... The cogitator block that was designed to transmit orders to the imprisoned C'tan shatters into pieces. It is a weapon no longer — merely a prison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Puedes verla en el lado opuesto del altar operativo del Yugo: probablemente, el arma de destrucción masiva más poderosa de la historia de tu especie. La llave que abre las puertas de un poder y una grandeza casi ilimitados. Un arma... El bloque cogitador envía sus órdenes al C'Tan aprisionado y estalla en mil pedazos. Ya no es un arma, tan solo una prisión.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你站在圣枷的操作祭坛前，凝视着圣枷。毫无疑问，它是人类历史上最强大的武器。这把钥匙打开的大门后面，隐藏着无法言喻的力量。然而这件武器……它负责传递命令的沉思者模块已经被摧毁，化为了无数碎片。圣枷已经失去了武器的功用，仅仅是星神碎片的囚牢而已。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you stand before the Yoke's control altar, you gaze upon it, possibly the greatest instrument of destruction in the history of your race. The key that unlocks the gates to the nigh-unfettered heights of power. A weapon... The cogitator block that was designed to transmit orders to the imprisoned C'tan shatters into pieces. It is a weapon no longer — merely a prison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你站在圣枷的操作祭坛对面，看着圣枷。毫无疑问，它是人类历史上最强大的武器，这把钥匙打开的大门后面，隐藏着几乎无穷无尽的力量。然而这件武器……当思考器模块将命令传达给囚笼中的星神时，思考器被粉碎，变成了无数碎片。圣枷已经不再是武器，仅仅是星神的囚牢罢了。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du lässt deinen Blick über den Kontrollaltar des Jochs schweifen ... der das wohl mächtigste Instrument der Zerstörung in der Geschichte deines Volkes ist. Der Schlüssel, der die Tore zu nahezu uneingeschränkter Macht öffnet. Eine Waffe ... Der Cogitator-Block, der Befehle an den eingesperrten C'tan übermitteln sollte, zerspringt in tausend Splitter. Er ist nun keine Waffe mehr, sondern ... nur ein Gefängnis.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you stand before the Yoke's control altar, you gaze upon it, possibly the greatest instrument of destruction in the history of your race. The key that unlocks the gates to the nigh-unfettered heights of power. A weapon... The cogitator block that was designed to transmit orders to the imprisoned C'tan shatters into pieces. It is a weapon no longer — merely a prison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Auf der anderen Seite des Betriebsaltars des Jochs steht sie: Die wohl mächtigste Vernichtungswaffe in der Geschichte deiner Spezies. Der Schlüssel, der die Tore zu fast endloser Macht und Größe öffnet. Eine Waffe ... Der Cogitator-Block, der die Befehle zum eingesperrten C'tan überträgt, zerspringt in Stücke. Keine Waffe mehr. Nur noch ein Gefängnis.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ヨークの制御用祭壇の反対側に立ち、あなたはそれを見つめる。それはおそらく、あなたの種族の歴史において最も強力な破壊兵器だ。ほぼ無限の力と高みへの門を開く鍵。兵器…閉じ込められていたク＝タンに命令を伝えるために設計されていた考算機ブロックはコナゴナに砕け散った。もはや、それは兵器ではなく、ただの牢獄だ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you stand before the Yoke's control altar, you gaze upon it, possibly the greatest instrument of destruction in the history of your race. The key that unlocks the gates to the nigh-unfettered heights of power. A weapon... The cogitator block that was designed to transmit orders to the imprisoned C'tan shatters into pieces. It is a weapon no longer — merely a prison.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ヨークの操作用祭壇の反対側に立ち、あなたはそれを見つめた。それは間違いなく、あなたの種族の歴史において最も強力な破壊兵器だ。ほぼ無限の力と壮大さへの門を開く鍵。兵器…考算機ブロックは、閉じ込められていたク＝タンに命令を伝え、コナゴナに砕け散った。もはや、それは兵器ではなく、ただの牢獄だ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Boyunduruk'un kontrol sunağının önünde duruyorsun, ırkının tarihindeki en büyük yıkım aleti olduğunu düşünerek ona bakıyorsun. Neredeyse dizginsiz bir gücün kapılarını açan anahtar, bir silah... Mahkûm C'tan'a emir iletmek için tasarlanan kavramsayar, parçalara ayrılıyor. Artık bir silah değil, sadece bir hapishane.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}As you stand before the Yoke's control altar, you gaze upon it, possibly the greatest instrument of destruction in the history of your race. The key that unlocks the gates to the nigh-unfettered heights of power. A weapon... The cogitator block that was designed to transmit orders to the imprisoned C'tan shatters into pieces. It is a weapon no longer — merely a prison.{/n}
